#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<stdio.h>
    int main()
    {
	    int t;
	    scanf("%d",&t);
	    while(t--)
	    {
		    int n,k;
		    float x,y;
		    scanf("%d%d%f%f",&n,&k,&x,&y);
		    float nd= n-(k*x+(n-k)*y);
		    float ans=(n-k)*(1-y)/nd;
		    printf("%.4f\n",ans);
	    }
	    return 0;
    }
